data.name: review_reminder
data.marketing: This plugin runs automatically in the background and sends a reminder email to guests to leave a review after a number of days from their departure date.
data.description: This plugin runs automatically in the background and sends a reminder email to guests to leave a review for the property they stayed at after N days from their departure date. This is a tool that will help build your property reviews database and potentially result in more bookings received by the property owner. After installing the plugin, a new button is created in the admin cpanel from which you can enable/disable the reminder and set the interval in days from the departure date at which the review reminder email is sent.
